Compressed Light.ITEM_DESCRIPTION: Almost weighless, light compressed in a small volume of void. This compression can be embedded in some sort of container and a releasing mechanism to produce an explosive object.

Compressed Power.ITEM_DESCRIPTION: A large amount of atoms compressed and constrained in a small volume of void, the power stored inside somehow have almost no leakage. This sort of compression can be embedded in a container and a releasing mechanism to produce a powerful explosive object.

Flare Base.ITEM_DESCRIPTION: A flare base that seems to have some mesh left in it, filling this with the material required for ignition can prove useful.

Lead.ITEM_DESCRIPTION: Useful only in inventory extension, consume to extend inventory capacity.

Long Rod.ITEM_DESCRIPTION: A long rod with a connection on one of the ends, if I had two of those I could perfectly fit them together into a rod with a contraption in the middle.

Wire.ITEM_DESCRIPTION: A wire useful for charging battery dependant devices and mechanisms. Must have a power source to charge with.

Beam Light.ITEM_DESCRIPTION: A beam light strong enough to keep the creatures away, but it heats up very fast, and the battery drain increases the longer it stays overheated

Charger.ITEM_DESCRIPTION: Useful for charging battery dependent equipment and platforms.

Flash Bomb.ITEM_DESCRIPTION: A bomb that has a chance to eliminate the creatures or keep them away.

Light Bomb.ITEM_DESCRIPTION: A bomb that is guaranteed to eliminate the creatures upon contact with its strong light.

Light Flower.ITEM_DESCRIPTION: A flower that creates a light for a duration, keeps the creatures away, picking this up after planting has a chance of restoring a flower with no light.

Shockwave Beam.ITEM_DESCRIPTION: A shockwave of light with low range that is strong enough to eliminate any shadows that come in contact with its light.

Signal Flare.ITEM_DESCRIPTION: Lights the way in dark areas.
